attributes.action: Tougher Punishment In Courts (After these last few days!)
attributes.additional_details:
We need a new start in this country.

The law in the country is NO LONGER respected by those who do crime and disrupt others lives.

I am growing tired of hearing about those who do crimes and end up with a little fine and a bit of community service.

I promise you, that in a week, or maybe two weeks the people we have seen destroying our home country in last few days will be forgotten and the courts will simply do what I stated above.

I ask that you sign this petition if you, like me, do not want to forget.

Let's get OUR country on the right track, enough is enough.

Tougher punishment for thieves, tougher punishment for anti-social behaviour, tougher punishment for horrific crimes.

I want to be proud of my country, not ashamed anymore.
